alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 1:41PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Wakulla, southeastern Gadsden, central Liberty and southwestern Leon Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 140 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles south of Greensboro, or 15 miles east of Blountstown, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Midway, Tallahassee Community College, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Lake Bradford, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, Eight Mile Pond, Griffin Heights, Lowry, Bloxham and Bethel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
